title: What type of digital products can you sell? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are loads of digital products online, millions of products in fact so it can be a little overwhelming to know what is a good product to promote! There are a few things I like to consider when looking at digital products to sell online: Is there a hungry market for the product already?Is it legal and ethical to sell the product you’re looking at?How do you get paid and how often?Does the product offer support if something goes wrong?Is the product good value for money?If there’s already a hungry market for your product then it should be easier to sell. Making sure it’s legal and ethical will also keep you out of trouble, there’s no point making a whole ton of money if it lands you in handcuffs! Payment processors can be temperamental when it comes to selling digital products so it’s a smart approach to check which payment portal you can use and make sure your product is compliant with their terms, Paypal is renowned for freezing monies for digital products and holding the funds for extended periods of time. It’s also smart to sell products that offer good value and support so you just have to do the selling and the company takes care of the rest, this is a good way to just focus on making money without stress of refunds and complaints. Hope this helps, all the best! Jeremy :)

Yea about that I would suggest you create a niche or content about something that you are interested in and then try to find a product that is related to that niche/content because you can't just start selling random product online you will not get any traffic to your product which means you will not get any sales. So if you know this already the best way to find a digital product to sell online would be to check some of the biggest Digital Marketing platforms like ClickBank or JVZoo, Shareasale, Muncheye, etc..

There’s many you can choose from. Ideally use products which pay you recurring commissions and have multiple income streams attached to them. If you have a passion or interest consider finding products which relate to it. That way you can build content around it to draw in prospective customers. See my bio for a training resource.

There are tons of digital products you can sell online, and what you choose depends on your area of expertise. You could sell ebooks or guides, software, songs, courses or tutorials, graphic designs, photography, online templates, videos (like stock videos, films, etc.), 3D models, apps, games, plugins, and so much more. I found a few websites that might be helpful: 101 Profitable Digital Products You Can Sell Online in 2020 | Sellfy20 Digital Products to Sell Online (That People Want)18 Digital Product Ideas That Fit Almost Every Small Business10 Best Digital Products to Sell in 2020 - Blogging Her Way

There are many digital products that you sell: Social media services like Facebook, InstagramDigital coupons or musicDigital media -Media space for brands and agenciesDigital curreny tradingAffiliate marketingThere are too many to name but depending on what you are selling or how you position yourself ROI can be high here.  I hope you find this helpful and If you are looking for tips of sales strategies this blog can help.
